Question
========

The distribution of water requirements (in liters) during a flight from Amsterdam to New York has an average of 3 liters per passenger and a variation of 1.6. Suppose you take a random flight with 250 passengers, what is the distribution of this sample?

Answerlist
----------

* It is normally distributed with a mean of 1.5 and standard deviation of 0.08.
* It is normally distributed with a mean of 3 and standard deviation of 0.08.
* It is normally distributed with a mean of 3 and standard deviation of 1.27.
* It is normally distributed with a mean of 3 and standard deviation of 1.6.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* It is normally distributed with a mean of 1.5 and standard deviation of 0.08...: Incorrect
* It is normally distributed with a mean of 3 and standard deviation of 0.08...: Correct
* It is normally distributed with a mean of 3 and standard deviation of 1.27.: Incorrect Incorrect
* It is normally distributed with a mean of 3 and standard deviation of 1.6: Incorrect
